title: Arcane Mark
description: Inscribes a permanent personal rune (visible or invisible).

title: Dancing Lights
description: Creates torches or other lights for 1 minute.

title: Detect Illusion
description: Detects Illusions in a 60’ radius for 1 minute per level.

title: Ghost Sound
description: Figment sounds for 1 round/level.

title: Prestidigitation
description: Performs minor tricks for 1 hour.

title: Read Magic
description: Read Scrolls and Spellbooks for 10/min per level.

title: Charm Person
description: Makes one person your friend for 1 hour per level.

title: Color Spray
description: Incapacitates creatures within a 15’ cone.

title: Disguise Self
description: Changes your appearance for 10 minutes per level.

title: Hypnotism
description: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures for 2d4 rounds.

title: Silent Image
description: Creates minor illusion of your design.

title: Ventriloquism
description: Throws voice for 1 minute per level.

title: Blur
description: Spellcaster gains +4 to AC, cannot be Sneak Attacked for 1 minute per level.

title: Hideous Laughter
description: Subject loses actions for 1 round/level.

title: Hypnotic Pattern
description: Fascinates 2d4+level HD of creatures for concentration plus 2 rounds.

title: Invisibility
description: Subject is invisible for 1 minute/ level or until it attacks.

title: Minor Image
description: As Silent Image plus some sound.

title: Mirror Image
description: Creates 1d4+1 decoys of Spellcaster for 1 minute per level.

title: Daylight
description: 60’ radius of daylight for 10 minute/level.

title: Deep Slumber
description: Puts 10HD of creatures to sleep for 1 minute per level.

title: Displacement
description: Attacks against the subject miss 50% of the time for 1 round/level.

title: Invisibility Sphere
description: Makes everyone within 10’ invisible.

title: Major Image
description: As minor image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

title: Suggestion
description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action for 1 hour/level or until completed.

title: Charm Monster
description: Make one monster believe it is your ally for 1 day/level.

title: Confusion
description: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

title: Invisibility, Greater
description: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

title: Minor Creation
description: Create one cloth or wood object.

title: Phantasmal Killer
description: Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

title: Rainbow Pattern
description: Lights Fascinate 24HD of creatures for concentration plus 1rnd/level.

title: Break Enchantment
description: Frees subjects from enchantments, alterations, curses, and petrification.

title: Dominate Person
description: Controls subject telepathically for 1 day/level.

title: Major Creation
description: As minor creation, plus stone or metal.

title: Persistent Image
description: As major image, but no concentration required; 1 minute/level.

title: Seeming
description: Changes appearance of 1 person per 2 levels for 12 hours.

title: Sending
description: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

title: Mislead
description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

title: Permanent Image
description: Permanent illusion with sight, sound, and smell controlled by concentration.

title: Programmed Image
description: As major image, triggered by specific event.

title: Shadow Walk
description: Step into shadow and travel rapidly; 50mph for 1 hour/level.

title: Suggestion, Mass
description: As suggestion, plus one subject per level.

title: True Seeing
description: Lets you see things as they truly are.

title: Invisibility, Mass
description: As invisibility, but affects all in range.

title: Phase Door
description: Creates invisible passage through wood and stone.

title: Power Word
description: Blinds creature with 200hp or less.

title: Prismatic Spray
description: 60’ Cone-shaped burst of rays for variety of effects.

title: Project Image
description: Illusory double can talk and cast spells at medium range for 1 round/level.

title: Weird
description: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30’.
